snippet: In what one of its players called a “revenge game,” Nazareth of Brooklyn beat Christ the King in a semifinal of the New York state girls’ Catholic High School Athletic Association tournament.
abstract: Nazareth Regional High School of Brooklyn defeats Christ the King, 52-47, in the semifinals of the New York State Girls’ Catholic High School Athletic Association tournament.
lead_paragraph: In what one of its players called a “revenge game,” Nazareth of Brooklyn beat Christ the King in a semifinal of the New York state girls’ Catholic High School Athletic Association tournament.

headline.seo: Nazareth Defeats Christ the King in Catholic High School Athletic Association Semifinal
headline.main: Nazareth Gets Revenge and Shot at Another Title
headline.print_headline: Nazareth Defeats Christ the King, Setting Up Another Shot at a Title
